build.buildCommand: npm run build && mkdir -p storage/framework/{sessions,views,cache,testing} storage/logs bootstrap/cache && chmod -R 777 storage && find public/build -name '*.js' -o -name '*.css' || echo 'Build files not found'

deploy.startCommand: chmod -R 777 storage bootstrap/cache && php artisan config:clear && php artisan route:clear && php artisan view:clear && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache && php artisan migrate --force && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
